meanings.definition: In a manner that is beyond comparison.
meanings.sent1: She sings incomparably well in the choir.
meanings.sent2: The view from the mountaintop is incomparably beautiful.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at dancing was incomparably hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The sunsets here are incomparably vibrant.
meanings.sent5: The taste of her homemade pie was incomparably delicious.

meanings.definition: To a degree that cannot be equaled.
meanings.sent1: He incomparably outperformed his competitors in the race.
meanings.sent2: The new technology incomparably improves efficiency in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The cat incomparably outsmarted the mouse in the game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her craft is incomparably strong.
meanings.sent5: The bond between the twins is incomparably deep.
